website_summaries.verdict: Between its chart-plotting GPS, detailed sonar images, bright display, and many other premium features, the HELIX 7 is hands-down Humminbird’s best.
pros: View crystal-clear sonar images from 125 feet both below and on both sides of your boat
Easy to switch between information-packed display modes
cons: A touchscreen version would have been nice

customer_reviews.title: Humminbird warranty
customer_reviews.text: SI imaging would not change colors. Great product and awesome features for the price. And the SI is really not a big deal I understand not everything will be perfect. But what bugs me is when I pay full price and when I get the product and it doesn’t work. Humminbird charges me round trip shipping and makes me pay insurance on it just so that I can get a product to do what it’s supposed to do. I didn’t expect that from a company like Humminbird. When you sell your customer a product that has a warranty don’t make the customer pay for your mistake.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: DECEPTIVE ADVERTISING - NO SD CARD OR HEAD MANUAL
customer_reviews.text: Save your money and read the fine print. This model does not come with the map SD card. Other models with the same # come with it. We were missing this and the head manual and would need to take it off the boat & return it to buy the other one for a lower price to get the SD card. Just wow ...this was Amazons customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Helix 7 mega si g3n
customer_reviews.text: Ive purchased the humminbird helix 7 mega si g3n hands down a awesome unit for the price i can locate exactly what im lookin for and continue to put fish in the boat time and time again
customer_reviews.author: Toad chasin rivera

customer_reviews.title: As good as costlier
customer_reviews.text: I have different fish finders that cost a lot more than this one, and I don't see any more on the expensive ones. So buy this one for all you need. Shows depth, water temperature, speed, coordinates, time, you can save good fishing spots to come back to later. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Doug M L

customer_reviews.title: Mega is great
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time two days ago and I think it's great. The side imaging lets me find stuff on my home lake that I had no idea was there. Love the GPS and the Mega side and down imaging. I'm sure bigger is better but this is a great fish finder for my 16 1/2' bass boat. For the first side imaging I have ever owned I'm very happy with it! It has that wow factor for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Richard D Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you'll like it.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good visibility in bright outdoors. A complex product, so requires some study- practice time. Really works.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and value.
customer_reviews.text: The side scan and detail imaging are great for a novice fisherman like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Not For Trolling Motor Mounting
customer_reviews.text: These are the best units on the market. I have no complaints except. This unit has a transducer that CANNOT be used on trolling motor. Please verify your mounting before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Great depth finder.
customer_reviews.text: Side and down imaging are spectacular. Some of my buttons are sticky and didn't work so I had to have it sent back in. Came back better but not great. Otherwise love the imagery and ease of use. Map card a bonus for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work as expected. Read the complete review.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit because the side image feature. This does not work deeper than 50~60 ft. The unit does not read if you are above 15 mph. My old Lowrance only with 50/200 kHz read at 25 mph. The transducer wire is REALLY too short. I have a 23 ft boat and had to buy an extension for the transducer. It was not cheap. So, make sure you need to add almos $50 for the extension if you buy this unit. I really did not see the benefits I was expecting. Can not return because is installed already and was Very difficult to run the transducer wire. I strongly do not recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get this product installed and on the water. Hooked up 12V and nothing.... can’t get a hold of Humminbird. Hoping I can get a new one shipped so I don’t need to tear it out and return it. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Buttons do not work
customer_reviews.text: after installation, I was performing the setup and found that the view button and both the Plus and Negative buttons do not work. I contacted Hummingbird and they sent me a return for repair authorization label and I'm waiting on it to be return to me. will update once I get it back. (word of advice), always register your produces once you receive them to ensure you have warranty coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money and totally changed crappie fishing for me. It takes some time to figure out all the features and what settings work best. perfect screen size and good detail. I have 2 of these mounted on my boat and i highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Greatoutdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well and can’t return it. Shuts on and off defective
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good deal for what you're buying
customer_reviews.text: Liked, I've been wanting one for so long, this unit is a 2019 and it has features in it now that you could only have in a bigger unit. The price was amazing for what you are purchasing, priced them out all over the country and your price was amazing Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Lowrence Hook7 5-19. Replaced it with this Helix 7. The picture quality and ease of use of the Helix is FAR superior to the Hook. I paid $590 for the Hook and sold it in 6 months for $200. Hook was a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish/Depth finder!!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Humminbird Helix 7. Works like charm. Has a lot of features that I will probably never use, but it has a lot of features that I will use! Finds fish and shows the depth. What more do I need!
customer_reviews.author: rilia

customer_reviews.title: Great love it
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing just watch a few you tube videos on how to use it and you will be April on this thing in no time
customer_reviews.author: Thedealio2019

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this unit. Meets all my expectations It has a very clear and sharp display. I am still learning all the features and might add that the technical support I received for a couple questions is outstanding. Now just have to figure out how to catch the fish it locates.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Evert

customer_reviews.title: good depth, fish finder
customer_reviews.text: great depth finder for the money. 7" was around 700 dollars. the mega imaging is really great and clear with great resolution. The next size up is a 8" (hard to find) and cost about 1200. big jump in cost for additional inch but had a few extra features the 7 doesn't. maybe will come down in price later but about the same cost as other brands at this time.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I expected
customer_reviews.text: The imaging on this finder is crystal clear . It was easy to install and it's intuitive in using. All the variable split screen and color options are a nice feature . The GPS mapper could be a little more accurate.....but it's no worse than more expensive models I've seen. They should include an inline fuse connector for those of us who aren't plugging into a fuse panel. Overall.....very pleased and would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bob  K

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Didn't notice when I ordered that it didn't come with front cover. So get ready to add another 35$.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery gilley

customer_reviews.title: Husband Pleasing!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. He was so happy when he unwrapped it, he nearly cried! He wanted one, but wasnt expecting it! The price is $200 lower on Amazon than we saw on a retail shelf, so we feel like the value is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Resz

customer_reviews.title: Does the job for the price.
customer_reviews.text: A bit small for those of us with visual changes.
customer_reviews.author: Tml1982

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good quality fish finder. I have two. One for sonar and one for GPS. I like them better than the Lowrance ones I had that kept turning off?
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love all the features. Changed from the helix 5 to the seven. Hige difference!
customer_reviews.author: Gill

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Take the time and install this unit the right way and it works great . Nice mega down imaging is easy to see what’s there . TRANSDUCER INSTALLATION IS IMPORTANT FOR RESULTS !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Item broke after 60 days. Horrible customer service. Better prices elsewhere buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: patrick guy

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Was missing parts to the mounting. It didn't come with a manual
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: So happy it came with the navionics card and I can actually find fish now
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie

customer_reviews.title: 20% restocking fee if you need to return it
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware. Under the unfortunate circumstance that you may end up needing to return this item to Amazon Tackle & Gun, they will impose a 20% restocking fee, claiming that the item can no longer be sold as new, without considering that in order to even power the thing up, you need to splice the wires to a power source. They do care. They just see a opportunity to make a profit based be on fine print that they selectively choose to follow when the opportunity arises.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Toledo Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great unit shipped as ordered and arrived early.
customer_reviews.text: This unit is perfect. Size is just what I wanted to fit and the views are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Gbob

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had favorite buttons like the larger fish finders.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Fish Finder
customer_reviews.text: Husband was thrilled when he seen the surprise I had for him. He loves his Hummingbird fish finder. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LFricks

customer_reviews.title: This Humminbird is JUNK!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This junk was delivered on May 30th I try to use it July 19th not a mouth and a half later and it wont even boot up!! its been more then 30 days so now I cant even talk to anyone !! great Customer service!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Vernot

customer_reviews.title: Great features for the price
customer_reviews.text: These helix units have great features. They are very easy to use straight out of the Box. I caught them on sale I don't unbelievable price. I'm extremely happy with the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Whycook

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Amazing imaging.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Still learning the setting and how to best use it.
customer_reviews.author: william barkley

customer_reviews.title: Is very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This unit is amazing view that this unit gives the detail is unreal I counld'nt be happer
customer_reviews.author: michael housinger

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love it, worth every penny. We installed it ourselves too!
customer_reviews.author: Cozine

customer_reviews.title: Everything
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet, just a review on the installation, only issue was the transducer cable was too short. Big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: High-Tech
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome! my husband wanted it so bad and we ordered it and took it out and the quality is so great! I recommend to all fishermen!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Wobszal

customer_reviews.title: Great for fishing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great asset to have while fishing, the GPS feature works great there are various screens for the sonar and that's good very easy product to understand I'm happy I have it
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Low quality check
customer_reviews.text: Just purchased and hooked up to the boat , plus and minus button for the zoom do not work on any view , the view button has to be pressed hard to work . Contacting hummingbird in the morning .
customer_reviews.author: Will cope

customer_reviews.title: false advertising
customer_reviews.text: this machine has NO side scan although the way its advertised it makes you think your getting the sidescan model i am an avid fisherman and was very disapointed with my purchase UNFOTUNEATLY you dont no it till its all installed ive spent alot of money with amazon and im totally pissed about this machine i hate it i dont want it sucks
customer_reviews.author: keith lauziere

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So I wasn't planning on spending as much as I did on this model but im glad I did. Still learning how to use it as it has quite a few options. Also it came with a $200 Navionics card which it awesome! If you have the money to spend this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed pics.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great asset for the tech savvy. But common fishermen should not spend so much. Difficult to find what you need.
customer_reviews.author: C F

customer_reviews.title: Easy of use
customer_reviews.text: Works great nice clear screen great detail easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Scott O.

customer_reviews.title: Love my Humminbird!
customer_reviews.text: If it tells you there isn’t fish there then move on! Completely satisfied with mine!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Do your homework and be ready to learn
customer_reviews.text: It’s not plug and play and all the little acronyms mean something. Si vs Di, G3 vs G3N etc. Make sure the model you’re actually buying has the features you want. It gets confusing and by the time it’s all said and done and nickeled and dimed you’ll wish you had spent the extra $300. All of this should be common sense but there’s so many models that are really closely related. Just because something is “available” for your model don’t mean you’ll get it. With all that said I’m super excited about the technology and I’ve bought into the unknown, now i have a need to know!
customer_reviews.author: AntBme

customer_reviews.title: Great Display and Fish finder
customer_reviews.text: I see the fish! Awesome on my Bonafide Kayak with Bioennopower 15 ah battery.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Good chance you will spend more money then you thought
customer_reviews.text: The unit works fine. But the company not so much. If you buy one don't expect the head mounting hardware wear even though they say it's in the box it ant. When you call them they tell you that it is in the box in a plastic bag like you have not already looked. So expect to spend another 30 bucks this happen to two other people I know from my erea. Good luck
customer_reviews.author: Jack C.

customer_reviews.title: GPS slow and glitchy
customer_reviews.text: easy to install , sounder worked great , GPS was slow and kept freezing up , , returned and bought a Simrad go7 for only 20 dollars more , a much better all around piece
customer_reviews.author: curtis murphy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in the product
customer_reviews.text: I am no stranger to using fish finders, been using them for years. Did a lot of research on this because i wanted mega down imaging and side imaging. Long story short, had my old 2d sonar active while testing the new helix 7. old 2d sonar was marking fish, side imaging and down imaging was pretty garbage even the 2d sonar was picking up the fish on this. Fishing crystal clear water at DVL, i see 10+ pound carp swimming underneath my boar and helix 7 didnt see them. even spent hours look at the play back, wow what a disappointment. I should have got a lowrance.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Better than Lowrance
customer_reviews.text: After having a Lowrance unit for about a year filled with issues, I ditched it and went with this Hummingbird. The quality, screen clarity, user interface and features are leaps and bounds over the Hook5 that I had. I am very pleased with the features of this unit including the AutoChart. This has proven to be very helpful when trying to repeat that hot line over and over again or seeing the depth changes. I would buy this unit again if I had to. Great sonar for your fishing boat.
customer_reviews.author: JeepJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Very bright and clear screen even in sunlight
customer_reviews.text: Have not had this very long but love it! Had a real hard time seeing my old fish finder in sunlight and it lacked many of the features that this one has. Not sure how all the features work yet as this is going to be a "learning" experience, but so far it is great. Really like the maps view as I fish large lakes in Michigan and so far all the lakes I fish are included in the maps. The only thing I haven't liked; maybe understood, is how the down imaging works as a view of the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I drank the koolaid
customer_reviews.text: Wow just installed in a wilderness systems atak 140 kayak what a game changer i can map ponds other boats or no motor allowed lakes amazing stuff. Pics to come. The installation into the pod system for wilderness was easy if you have the know how. Medium skill level can be done with a drill/impact and a few bits.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary M.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a pontoon, tracks fish with the best of them and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: The chancelor

customer_reviews.title: Love my Humminbird, they work well.
customer_reviews.text: This Fish finder/depth finder. Is one of the best I have ever found. Very clear in detail. I would say get the Side Scan a bit more but I feel it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Block

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed. Does not perform as i would have hoped. My gen 2 Humminbird 5 inch helix Di seemed to have a better definition.
customer_reviews.author: Badaxed

customer_reviews.title: Number one!
customer_reviews.text: Simply the best. After two Lowrance models I found something that actually works!
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Not thing but Thanks very much
customer_reviews.text: Thank you amazon for the job you're done Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnie Yann

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. This helix is not g3n. So it does not connect to ipilot link.
customer_reviews.author: glenn

customer_reviews.title: Helix come with a large variety of options.  Study the features available with each model.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that I did not have to change the electrical connection from my old Hummingbird, and could use the old bracket for the new transducer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Humminbird 410950-1NAV HELIX 7 CHIRP MSI (MEGA Side Imaging) GPS G3 NAV Fish Finder
product_meta.description: Style:HELIX 7 CHIRP MSI GPS G3 NAV| Pattern Name:Fish FinderHumminbird 410950-1NAV HELIX 7 Fishfinder CHIRP MSI GPS G3 nav. The HELIX 7 CHIRP MEGA SI GPS G3 nav+ fish finder features MEGA Side Imaging, MEGA Down Imaging, Dual Spectrum CHIRP Sonar, AutoChart Live, GPS and Humminbird basemap built-in. The 7", ultra-wide display gives you ample room to view the many pre-loaded split screen view options. This unit includes a Navionics+ map card with data for over 21, 000 lakes in the U.S. And Canada.
feature_bullets: 7-Inch screen with 800H x 480V resolution color TFT display
Includes Navionics+ (U.S. And Canada) SD card for out-of-the-box map coverage of over 21, 000 lakes and waterbodies
Mega Side Imaging: see the world below like never before with crystal-clear viewing out to 125 feet on either side of your boat
Mega Down Imaging: Get unprecedented underwater clarity with coverage down to 125 feet below your boat
Includes transducer and mounting hardware, power cable and gimbal mounting bracket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars287 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: HELIX 7 CHIRP MSI GPS G3 NAV fishfinder, transducer,mounting hardware, power cable and gimbal mounting bracket
